SETUP: : Cavemand Crossing will play as USSR.
brown_town will play as USA.
Handicap influence: US +2
Scenario: Standard
Optional Cards Added
Time per Player: 3 Hours
USSR +1 in East Germany [0][4]
USSR +4 in Poland [0][4]
USSR +1 in Yugoslavia [0][1]
US +4 in West Germany [4][0]
US +4 in Italy [4][0]
US +1 in Iran [2][0]

Turn 1, Headline Phase: Captured Nazi Scientist* & Containment*: USSR Headlines Captured Nazi Scientist*
US Headlines Containment*
Event: Containment*
Containment* is now in play.

Event: Captured Nazi Scientist*
USSR advances to 1 in the Space Race.
USSR gains 2 VP. Score is USSR 2.


Turn 1, USSR AR1: Duck and Cover: Event: Duck and Cover
DEFCON degrades to 4
US gains 1 VP. Score is USSR 1.

Coup (3 Ops):
Target: Iran
SUCCESS: 2 [ + 3 - 2x2 = 1 ]
US -1 in Iran [1][0]
USSR Military Ops to 3
DEFCON degrades to 3


Turn 1, US AR1: Formosan Resolution*: Place Influence (2 Ops):
US +1 in Malaysia [1][0]
US +1 in Iran [2][0]
US +1 in Pakistan [1][0]


Turn 1, USSR AR2: The Cambridge Five: Event: The Cambridge Five
US reveals Europe Scoring
USSR +1 in France [0][1]


Turn 1, US AR2: US/Japan Mutual Defense Pact*: Place Influence (4 Ops):
US +4 in France [4][1]


Turn 1, USSR AR3: Suez Crisis*: Event: Suez Crisis*
US -1 in Israel [0][0]
US -2 in France [2][1]
US -1 in UK [4][0]

US discards Decolonization

US +1 in France [3][1]
US +1 in Iraq [1][1]

USSR +1 in UK [4][1]

No VP awarded. Score is USSR 1.

USSR reveals NORAD*
